readingMnemonic: She turns her <kanji>amazing</kanji> gaze onto your <reading>sa</reading>ber (せい) and hits it with an ice beam. Woah! Instead of turning to ice or shattering, it steals her awful powers. Now your saber is amazing and terrible too!
meaningMnemonic: Your <radical>ice</radical> <radical>wife</radical> is <kanji>amazing</kanji>. She's also <kanji>terrible</kanji>, because she's very cold and has many ice powers, but that's also part of what makes her amazing!
